sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_c6b4a08887f60d101cbaedf73cbb35c2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getIncDetails</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var queryParams = request.queryParams;
    var number = queryParams.number; // get the "number" parameter

    var payload = {};
    var grIncident = new GlideRecord('incident');

    if (number == 'teapot') { // https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Status/418
        response.setStatus(418);// https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7168#section-2.3.3
    } else if (grIncident.get('number', number.toString())) { // look for an incident with that number
        payload = { // build a JSON object with the values from that record
            'number': grIncident.getValue('number'),
            'state': grIncident.getDisplayValue('state'),
            'short_description': grIncident.getValue('short_description'),
            'assignment_group': grIncident.getValue('assignment_group'),
            'description': grIncident.getValue('description'),
            'assigned_to': grIncident.getValue('assigned_to'),
            'cmdb_ci_name': grIncident.getDisplayValue('cmdb_ci'),
            'cmdb_ci': grIncident.getValue('cmdb_ci'),
            'caller_id_name': grIncident.getDisplayValue('caller_id'),
            'caller_id': grIncident.getValue('caller_id'),
            'category': grIncident.getDisplayValue('category')
        };
        response.setBody(payload); // return the JSON payload
        response.setStatus(200); // 200 == Success
    } else {
        response.setBody("Invalid Record Number"); // return an error message
        response.setStatus(404); // Not found
    }

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/68106/fun_and_profit</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>eriemer</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-06 15:16:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>c6b4a08887f60d101cbaedf73cbb35c2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getIncDetails</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_c6b4a08887f60d101cbaedf73cbb35c2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>eriemer</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-25 22:17:44</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Fun and Profit">ef44a48487f60d101cbaedf73cbb35ae</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
